attributes.action: Hold a referendum and let the electorate decide on Britains future within the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the transfer of soverignty and power to an unelected bureaucracy is membership of the EU still in Britains interest. Since the original vote to join the Common Market many of us have not had a say in the integration into a federal Europe so a referendum is now essential to get the approval of the electorate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
